title: A lot of people would say 'sexy' is about the body. But to me, 'sexy' is a woman with confidence. I admire women who have very little fear.
author: Allegra Versace

title: Nothing is more despicable than respect based on fear.
author: Albert Camus

title: My coming to faith did not start with a leap but rather a series of staggers from what seemed like one safe place to another. Like lily pads, round and green, these places summoned and then held me up while I grew. Each prepared me for the next leaf on which I would land, and in this way I moved across the swamp of doubt and fear.
author: Anne Lamott

title: Censorship is the tool of those who have the need to hide actualities from themselves and from others. Their fear is only their inability to face what is real, and I can't vent any anger against them; I only feel this appalling sadness. Somewhere in their upbringing, they were shielded against the total facts of our existence.
author: Charles Bukowski

title: Let us never negotiate out of fear. But let us never fear to negotiate.
author: John F. Kennedy

title: In this journey, the fear creeps in from time to time. The hint of that is there because there's an unknown factor to everything. That's true in everyone's life. I don't choose to live there; I let it spark me.
author: Kerri Walsh Jennings

title: Our deepest fear is not that we are inadequate. Our deepest fear is that we are powerful beyond measure. It is our Light, not our Darkness, that most frightens us.
author: Marianne Williamson

title: Sometimes the point isn't to make people believe a lie - it's to make people fear the liar.
author: Anne Applebaum

title: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.
author: Ariana Grande

title: Overcoming fear is the first step to success for entrepreneurs. The winners all exemplify that, and the hard work and commitment they have shown underlines what is needed to set up a business.
author: Richard Branson

title: Ignorance breeds fear.
author: Mike Wilson

title: An exciting and inspiring future awaits you beyond the noise in your mind, beyond the guilt, doubt, fear, shame, insecurity and heaviness of the past you carry around.
author: Debbie Ford

title: Do not fear death so much but rather the inadequate life.
author: Bertolt Brecht

title: A good spicy challenge strikes a balance between flavour and fear.
author: Adam Richman

title: I have now taken a serious task upon myself and I fear a greater one that is in the power of any man to perform in the given time-but it is too late to go back.
author: Eli Whitney

title: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed.
author: Albert Einstein

title: No passion so effectually robs the mind of all its powers of acting and reasoning as fear.
author: Edmund Burke

title: Humility is a great quality of leadership which derives respect and not just fear or hatred.
author: Yousef Munayyer

title: Try a thing you haven't done three times. Once, to get over the fear of doing it. Twice, to learn how to do it. And a third time to figure out whether you like it or not.
author: Virgil Thomson

title: God, make me so uncomfortable that I will do the very thing I fear.
author: Ruby Dee

title: Fear is a powerful beast. But we can learn to ride it.
author: Justine Musk

title: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

title: There are people in every time and every land who want to stop history in its tracks. They fear the future, mistrust the present, and invoke the security of a comfortable past which, in fact, never existed.
author: Robert Kennedy

title: I think the big mistake in schools is trying to teach children anything, and by using fear as the basic motivation. Fear of getting failing grades, fear of not staying with your class, etc. Interest can produce learning on a scale compared to fear as a nuclear explosion to a firecracker.
author: Stanley Kubrick

title: When you have no fear, the possibilities are endless.
author: Jeffree Star

title: Kill the snake of doubt in your soul, crush the worms of fear in your heart and mountains will move out of your way.
author: Kate Seredy

title: Bravery is not the absence of fear, it is overcoming it.
author: Mellody Hobson

title: I fear no man, no beast or evil, brother.
author: Hulk Hogan

title: The more knowledge you have, the greater will be your fear of Allah.
author: Abu Bakr

title: I don't have a fear of flying; I have a fear of crashing.
author: Billy Bob Thornton

title: Puritanism. The haunting fear that someone, somewhere, may be happy.
author: H. L. Mencken

title: Remember your dreams and fight for them. You must know what you want from life. There is just one thing that makes your dream become impossible: the fear of failure.
author: Paulo Coelho

title: Fear is a powerful weapon. It can excite and motivate, and it can get people to yell and to scream. But fear has never created a job.
author: Andrew Cuomo

title: Willpower is the key to success. Successful people strive no matter what they feel by applying their will to overcome apathy, doubt or fear.
author: Dan Millman

title: I do not fear computers. I fear the lack of them.
author: Isaac Asimov

title: I just want to say, don't be afraid, believe in yourself, whatever comes your way you have to experience it to really know what that is. So if you have too much fear inside you may let go of certain opportunities or chances, so trust in yourself and stick with it.
author: Jisoo

title: Give me one hundred preachers who fear nothing but sin and desire nothing but God, and I care not whether they be clergymen or laymen, they alone will shake the gates of Hell and set up the kingdom of Heaven upon Earth.
author: John Wesley

title: 'No fear' is a mindset that I stand for. It's the reason why I've got to where I am today.
author: Skepta

title: Everyone's frightened. It's how you deal with that fear. It's very, very powerful. And what you've got to do is get it as a tailwind instead of a headwind. author: Jimmy Iovine

title: Uncertainty always creates doubt, and doubt creates fear.
author: Oscar Munoz

title: The world has nothing to fear from military ambition in our Government.
author: James K. Polk

title: In whosever presence you find peace of mind, devoid of fear, only that person can be your guru.
author: Ilaiyaraaja

title: The key to change... is to let go of fear.
author: Rosanne Cash

title: Jealousy is the fear or apprehension of superiority: envy our uneasiness under it.
author: William Shenstone

Suffering can destroy us or make us stronger. Fear can cripple us, or it can make us more courageous. It is resilience that makes the difference.
author: Eric Greitens

title: Men fear death as children fear to go in the dark; and as that natural fear in children is increased by tales, so is the other.
author: Francis Bacon

author: Eugene Ionesco

title: If fear is the great enemy of intimacy, love is its true friend.
author: Henri Nouwen

author: Thomas J. Stanley

title: The more you can increase fear of drugs and crime, welfare mothers, immigrants and aliens, the more you control all the people.
author: Noam Chomsky

title: War is big business. It's a lot of money going to and fro, and unfortunately a lot of angst, and a lot of fear, and a lot of doubt. author: Jon Anderson

title: Power is of two kinds. One is obtained by the fear of punishment and the other by acts of love. Power based on love is a thousand times more effective and permanent then the one derived from fear of punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

author: Dr. Dre

author: David Ignatius

title: Fear defeats more people than any other one thing in the world.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

title: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

author: Queen Latifah

author: Andrew Weil

author: Florence Nightingale

author: Richard M. Nixon

author: Bill Gates

author: Paul Kalanithi

title: We are biological creatures. We are born, we live, we die. There is no transcendent purpose to existence. Purged of both hope and fear, we find courage in the face of helplessness, insignificance and uncertainty.
author: Jonathan Sacks

title: I don't want the fear of failure to stop me from doing what I really care about.
author: Emma Watson

title: I live free of fear and full of hope.
author: Kayleigh McEnany

title: Fear is the highest fence.
author: Dudley Nichols

author: Joyce Meyer

title: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
author: Joel Osteen

title: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
author: Joseph Conrad

title: War is fear cloaked in courage.
author: William Westmoreland

title: Love is a symbol of eternity. It wipes out all sense of time, destroying all memory of a beginning and all fear of an end.
author: Madame de Stael

title: People who say, 'There's nothing to fear from spiders' have clearly never been to Australia.
author: Cate Blanchett

title: Fear not that thy life shall come to an end, but rather that it shall never have a beginning.
author: John Henry Newman

title: A cheerful frame of mind, reinforced by relaxation... is the medicine that puts all ghosts of fear on the run.
author: George Matthew Adams

author: Marian Anderson

title: He who does not fear death cares naught for threats.
author: Pierre Corneille

title: Never let the fear of striking out get in your way.
author: Babe Ruth

author: J. K. Rowling

title: Tell your heart that the fear of suffering is worse than the suffering itself. And no heart has ever suffered when it goes in search of its dream.
author: Paulo Coelho

title: I have no fear of losing my life - if I have to save a koala or a crocodile or a kangaroo or a snake, mate, I will save it.
author: Steve Irwin

title: Death in itself is nothing; but we fear to be we know not what, we know not where.
author: John Dryden

title: When you don't have anything to lose, you discover something wonderful: you're free to take great risks without fear or reservation.
author: Tullian Tchividjian

title: We must travel in the direction of our fear.
author: John Berryman

author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

author: Sukarno

author: Alice Walker

title: Don't do anything for fear, because fear will never do anything for you.
author: Black Thought

author: Robert Green Ingersoll

author: Saint Ambrose

title: I fear that the day I die, I am going to die without accomplishing what I have in my mind. Life is too short, and a lot of things can happen, and I am really keen to see it with my own eyes - and that is why I am in a hurry.
author: Mohammad bin Salman

title: Man's loneliness is but his fear of life.
author: Eugene O'Neill

title: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
author: James Baldwin

title: It's the fear of failure that drives all of us at Red Bull.
author: Christian Horner

title: My story is a freedom song of struggle. It is about finding one's purpose, how to overcome fear and to stand up for causes bigger than one's self.
author: Coretta Scott King

title: I have no fear of death. More important, I don't fear life.
author: Steven Seagal

title: I have a fear of labels. If someone labels me, I have to respond - do I acknowledge it, reject it, deny it, live up to it, and defy it? Labels can affect your ability to be yourself. author: B. D. Wong

author: Amy Morin

title: Things done well and with a care, exempt themselves from fear.
author: William Shakespeare

author: Natan Sharansky

title: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace.
author: Nelson Mandela

title: You need to let go of your fear and anxiety of being judged by others.
author: Gavin Newsom

title: God has been good to me. My faith has been good to me in the moments of deepest suffering, doubt and fear.
author: Pierce Brosnan

title: It is not the thing you fear that you must deal with: it is the mother of the thing you fear.
author: David Whyte

title: If children live with hostility, they learn to fight. If they live with fear, they learn to be apprehensive. If they live with criticism, they learn to condemn.
author: Ron Finley

title: The politics of fear are always the same. They are easily recognisable in retrospect. They are easy to acquiesce in at the time.
author: Naomi Alderman

title: Fear, greed and hope have destroyed more portfolio value than any recession or depression we have ever been through.
author: James O'Shaughnessy

title: Men are moved by two levers only: fear and self interest.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

title: Fain would I climb, yet fear I to fall.
author: Walter Raleigh

title: What I fear most is power with impunity. I fear abuse of power, and the power to abuse.
author: Isabel Allende

title: Have no fear of moving into the unknown. Simply step out fearlessly knowing that I am with you, therefore no harm can befall you; all is very, very well. Do this in complete faith and confidence.
author: Pope John Paul II

title: My fear was not of death itself, but a death without meaning.
author: Huey Newton

title: Fear is the most debilitating emotion in the world, and it can keep you from ever truly knowing yourself and others - its adverse effects can no longer be overlooked or underestimated. Fear breeds hatred, and hatred has the power to destroy everything in its path.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

title: The scariest thought in the world is that someday I'll wake up and realize I've been sleepwalking through my life: underappreciating the people I love, making the same hurtful mistakes over and over, a slave to neuroses, fear, and the habitual.
author: George Saunders

title: I do not fear truth. I welcome it. But I wish all of my facts to be in their proper context.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

title: There's always an element of fear that you need to work a lot until people get sick and tired of you or finally figure out that you're a fraud after all!
author: Ben Stiller

title: Limits, like fear, is often an illusion.
author: Michael Jordan

title: We need to kind of refresh our fear in order to refresh our understanding of how a safe place works.
author: Andrew Pyper

title: You have moments when you sulk, when you crib and cry and feel that, 'why me and why all these things are happening with me.' We are only human. It's about facing your fear and not giving up because you are the only person who will support yourself at the end of the day and if you dont do that than nobody else will.
author: Vaani Kapoor

title: For the men and women of the FBI, bravery is reflected not only in the physical courage often necessary in the job. It can be seen in the courage of conviction, in the courage to act with wisdom in the face of fear, and in the courage it takes to admit mistakes and move forward.
author: Robert Mueller

title: To be Catholic puts a lot of fear in you. It's a great religion, but also one that can limit your experience. You fear experience because everything is a sin.
author: Donatella Versace

title: Fear of failure, it's the greatest motivational tool. It drives me and drives me and drives me.
author: Jerry West

title: But by reframing the learning process and focusing on the cool end goal, the fear of failure is often taken off the table, and learning just comes more naturally.
author: Mark Rober

title: What is the benefit of fasting in our body while filling our souls with innumerable evils? He who does not play at dice, but spends his leisure otherwise, what nonsense does he not utter? author: Saint Basil

title: This man is freed from servile bands, Of hope to rise, or fear to fall; Lord of himself, though not of lands, And leaving nothing, yet hath all.
author: Lord Byron

title: Fear is the main source of superstition, and one of the main sources of cruelty. To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
author: Bertrand Russell

title: Revenge and retaliation always perpetuate the cycle of anger, fear and violence.
author: Coretta Scott King

title: Bad food is made without pride, by cooks who have no pride, and no love. Bad food is made by chefs who are indifferent, or who are trying to be everything to everybody, who are trying to please everyone... Bad food is fake food... food that shows fear and lack of confidence in people's ability to discern or to make decisions about their lives.
author: Anthony Bourdain

title: The best gift you can give yourself is getting over the fear of embarrassment because then you're completely free to try anything.
author: Jesse Itzler

title: Governments are composed of human beings, and all of the frailties that humans possess are absorbed into these governments and become active within these governments. Hatred, anger, jealousy, fear, greed, distrust and the whole host of afflictions that humans must bear, lurk just beneath the surface of civility displayed by 'government.'
author: John McAfee

title: Do not fear mistakes. There are none.
author: Miles Davis

title: I write for those women who do not speak, for those who do not have a voice because they were so terrified, because we are taught to respect fear more than ourselves. We've been taught that silence would save us, but it won't.
author: Audre Lorde

title: Nature soaks every evil with either fear or shame.
author: Tertullian

title: We cannot let fear and terror dictate how we live our lives, no matter what. Life is a blessing with an expiration date, and we must embrace it while we can.
author: Carmen Carrera

title: Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
author: Alexander Pope

title: The fear of failure never goes away. In many ways, you could argue that success multiplies the opportunities for failure. It's just more of an argument for becoming more comfortable with it.
author: Mark Manson

title: You have to let fear go. Another lesson is you just have to believe in yourself; you just have to. There's no way around it. No matter how things are stacked against you, you just have to every time.
author: Venus Williams

title: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
author: Bertrand Russell

title: I'm a man of faith. I only fear God, and my wife - sometimes.
author: Lech Walesa

title: When even one American - who has done nothing wrong - is forced by fear to shut his mind and close his mouth - then all Americans are in peril.
author: Harry S Truman

title: If you don't find time to meditate and get all that negative out, and if you don't have the right people being positive around you, this is a very scary job to have if you don't learn how to control your fear.
author: Nate Diaz

title: I am grateful that I didn't let fear get the best of me. It only holds you back from possibilities and greatness.
author: Mariska Hargitay

title: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.
author: Khalil Gibran

title: Fix reason firmly in her seat, and call to her tribunal every fact, every opinion. Question with boldness even the existence of a God; because, if there be one, he must more approve of the homage of reason, than that of blindfolded fear.
author: Thomas Jefferson

title: I don't fear anyone. We don't come to play in this sport.
author: Canelo Alvarez

title: Action cures fear. Indecision, postponement, on the other hand, fertilize fear.
author: David Joseph Schwartz

title: Jealousy is the fear of comparison.
author: Max Frisch

title: The world is run on fear and shame. And I don't feel like we can begin to overcome these things until we speak about them openly and stop being scared of what happens as a result.
author: Lily Allen

title: I love the ocean. I've always liked the blue, so tranquil and peaceful and gliding. And the fear of it.
author: Siouxsie Sioux

title: Leaders are visionaries with a poorly developed sense of fear and no concept of the odds against them.
author: Robert Jarvik

title: Why fear death? It is the most beautiful adventure in life.
author: Charles Frohman

title: If you have stage fright, it never goes away. But then I wonder: is the key to that magical performance because of the fear?
author: Stevie Nicks

title: The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
author: William Jennings Bryan

title: Boredom, anger, sadness, or fear are not 'yours,' not personal. They are conditions of the human mind. They come and go. Nothing that comes and goes is you.
author: Eckhart Tolle

title: In boxing, I had a lot of fear. Fear was good. But, for the first time, in the bout with Muhammad Ali, I didn't have any fear. I thought, 'This is easy. This is what I've been waiting for'. No fear at all. No nervousness. And I lost.
author: George Foreman

title: Internet freedom is not possible without freedom from fear, and users will not be free from fear unless they are sufficiently protected from online theft and attack.
author: Rebecca MacKinnon

title: I don't operate on fear, and I don't let fear control me.
author: Kali Uchis

title: Unless India stands up to the world, no one will respect us. In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.
author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

title: Fear is not a good teacher. The lessons of fear are quickly forgotten.
author: Mary Catherine Bateson

title: When we drop fear, we can draw nearer to people, we can draw nearer to the earth, we can draw nearer to all the heavenly creatures that surround us.
author: bell hooks

title: It's important to celebrate your failures as much as your successes. If you celebrate your failures really well, and if you get to the motto and say, 'Wow, I failed, I tried, I was wrong, I learned something,' then you realize you have no fear, and when your fear goes away, you can move the world.
author: Sebastian Thrun

title: Vertigo is the conflict between the fear of falling and the desire to fall.
author: Salman Rushdie

title: It is really very important while you are young to live in an environment in which there is no fear. Most of us, as we grow older, become frightened; we are afraid of living, afraid of losing a job, afraid of tradition, afraid of what the neighbours, or what the wife or husband would say, afraid of death.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

title: How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset.
author: George MacDonald

title: We live in a world dominated by fear and paranoia.
author: Steven Wilson

title: Although many of us fear death, I think there is something illogical about it.
author: Richard Dawkins

title: Fear is pain arising from the anticipation of evil.
author: Aristotle

title: In taking stock of ourselves, we should not forget that fear plays a large part in the drama of failure. That is the first thing to be dropped. Fear is a mental deficiency susceptible of correction, if taken in hand before it gains an ascendency over us. Fear comes with the thought of failure.
author: Douglas Fairbanks

title: People need each other to help each other up. But we can't stand near each other because we fear each other. When you get over fear, nothing matters anymore but love.
author: Tech N9ne

title: Fear is the foundation of most governments.
author: John Adams

title: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
author: Grace Paley

title: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
author: Baruch Spinoza

title: I am pretty fearless, and you know why? Because I don't handle fear very well; I'm not a good terrified person.
author: Stevie Nicks

title: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
author: Brian Tracy

title: Fear and euphoria are dominant forces, and fear is many multiples the size of euphoria. Bubbles go up very slowly as euphoria builds. Then fear hits, and it comes down very sharply. author: Alan Greenspan

title: The threat or fear of violence should not become an excuse or justification for restricting freedom of speech.
author: Alan Dershowitz

title: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
author: Sylvia Browne

title: I wish to be a martyr, and I don't fear death.
author: Muqtada al Sadr

title: I have this fear of clowns, so I think that if I surround myself with them, it will ward off all evil.
author: Johnny Depp

title: My aim, then, was to whip the rebels, to humble their pride, to follow them to their inmost recesses, and make them fear and dread us. Fear is the beginning of wisdom.
author: William Tecumseh Sherman

title: People say to me all the time, 'You have no fear.' I tell them, 'No, that's not true. I'm scared all the time. You have to have fear in order to have courage. I'm a courageous person because I'm a scared person.'
author: Ronda Rousey

title: Under the influence of fear, which always leads men to take a pessimistic view of things, they magnified their enemies' resources, and minimized their own.
author: Livy

title: Being a parent is not for the faint of heart. I may joke about knowing fear, but the fact is, the first time I ever knew real fear was the day Charlotte, my first child, was born. Suddenly there is someone in the world you care about more than anything.
author: Harlan Coben

title: Privacy is not for sale, and human rights should not be compromised out of fear or greed.
author: Pavel Durov

title: Self-acknowledgment boosts your emotional and spiritual immunity, giving you the strength you need to release the past and rise above fear, doubt or resignation.
author: Debbie Ford
